name: A Bell's Toll
description:
Be patient, it takes some time to download.

A 2D survival game with isometric pov, where a lantern is the only source of light. The player must use it to find and ring the bells that can be found around the map, as to repel enemies with the generated sound waves.

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/folken3it/sets/a-bells-toll-soundtrack
